metadata.name: CDN Profiles Secret
metadata.description: This module deploys a CDN Profile Secret.
Required. The name of the secret.
Conditional. The name of the parent CDN profile. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Optional. The type of the secret.
Conditional. The resource ID of the secret source. Required if the `type` is "CustomerCertificate".
Optional. The version of the secret.
Optional. The subject alternative names of the secret.
Optional. Indicates whether to use the latest version of the secret.

properties.parameters: [if(equals(parameters('type'), 'CustomerCertificate'), createObject('type', parameters('type'), 'secretSource', createObject('id', parameters('secretSourceResourceId')), 'secretVersion', parameters('secretVersion'), 'subjectAlternativeNames', parameters('subjectAlternativeNames'), 'useLatestVersion', parameters('useLatestVersion')), null())]

metadata.description: The resource ID of the secret.
The name of the resource group the secret was created in.
